name: OR_LNLG_INSTR_FLASH
description: This table contains documentation regarding the use of flash biological indicators.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the line record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: FLSH_BIOL_INDICAT_C_NAME
columns.description: This item will store the indicator used to test for biological growth tests for sterile implants.
